ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document provides ioosTemplateVersion value in the sml:capabilities [@name="ioosServiceMetadata"] element.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAIL: swe:Text doesn't have a definition
FAIL: swe:value should be "1.0" (or do we have a new version?)

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.2
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a network of stations provides valid reference to the EPSG::4326 CRS in a bounding box description gml:boundedBy/gml:Envelope [@srsName="http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326"] element.

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.3
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a network of stations provides valid networkID identifier, and the networkID: (a) has definition as sml:Term [@definition="http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/definition/networkID"]; (b) has a value as URN that conforms to the IOOS Conventions for Observing Asset Identifiers; and (c) matches the gml:name value in the sos:ObservationOffering for that network in the Capabilities document.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: sml:Identifier/sml:Term/sml:value is not a valid IOOS network urn: ', $smlIdentifier/sml:Term/sml:value)

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAIL: sml:Identifier/sml:Term/sml:value does not exist as an sos:ObservationOffering in the Capabilites response

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.4
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a network of stations provides valid network shortName identifier, and the identifier has (a) definition as sml:Term [@definition="http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/definition/shortName"]; and (b) a text string value.

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.5
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a network of stations provides valid network longName identifier, and the identifier has (a) definition as sml:Term [@definition="http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/definition/longName"]; and (b) a text string value.

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.6
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML response document provides for each network or station the reference to at least one parent network with IOOS codeSpace and RA Acronym value.

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.7
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a network of station provides valid values for all following elements: (a) /sml:SensorML/sml:member[1]/sml:System[1]/sml:contact/sml:ContactList/sml:member[@xlink:role#"http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/definition/operator"]/sml:ResponsibleParty/sml:contactInfo/sml:address/sml:country; (b) /sml:SensorML/sml:member[1]/sml:System[1]/sml:contact/sml:ContactList/sml:member[@xlink:role#"http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/definition/publisher"]/sml:ResponsibleParty/sml:contactInfo/sml:address/sml:country; (c) /sml:SensorML/sml:member[1]/sml:System[1]/sml:contact/sml:ContactList/sml:member[@xlink:role#"http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/definition/operator"]/sml:ResponsibleParty/sml:contactInfo/sml:address/sml:electronicMailAddress; (d) /sml:SensorML/sml:member[1]/sml:System[1]/sml:contact/sml:ContactList/sml:member[@xlink:role="http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/definition/publisher"]/sml:ResponsibleParty/sml:contactInfo/sml:address/sml:electronicMailAddress

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAIL: operator sml:address/sml:electronicMailAddress is not a valid email address
FAIL: publisher sml:address/sml:electronicMailAddress is not a valid email address

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.8
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a network of stations provides a location of each network member station in sml:location/gml:Point [@srsName="http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326" element with the values of latitude and longitude that are located within the spatial segment defined in the gml:boundedBy element.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: gml:boundedByMinLat (', $boundedByMinLat, ') is not a valid latitude')
concat('FAIL: gml:boundedByMinLng (', $boundedByMinLng, ') is not a valid longitude')
concat('FAIL: gml:boundedByMaxLat (', $boundedByMaxLat, ') is not a valid latitude')
concat('FAIL: gml:boundedByMaxLng (', $boundedByMaxLng, ') is not a valid longitude')
concat('FAIL: component sml:System not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component sml:System/sml:location not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component sml:System/sml:location/gml:Point not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component sml:System/sml:location/gml:Point/@srsName != http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326 for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component sml:System/sml:location/gml:Point/gml:pos not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component gml:pos latitude coordinate not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component gml:pos longitude coordinate not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: gml:pos latitude (', $componentPosLat, ') is not a valid latitude for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: gml:pos longitude (', $componentPosLng, ') is not a valid longitude for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component gml:pos latitude is less than gml:boundedBy min latitude for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component gml:pos latitude is greater than gml:boundedBy max latitude for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component gml:pos longitude coordinate is less than gml:boundedBy min longitude for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component gml:pos longitude coordinate is greater than gml:boundedBy max longitude for component ', @name)

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.9
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a network of stations provides a time range of observations for each network member station in sml:capabilities [@name="observationTimeRange"] element with a valid time value pair specifying a time range in ISO 8601 format.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: component sml:capabilities[@name=observationTimeRange] not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component sml:capabilities[@name=observationTimeRange]/swe:DataRecord not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component swe:field[@name=observationTimeRange] not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component swe:TimeRange[@definition=http://mmisw.org/ont/ioos/swe_element_type/observationTimeRange] not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component time swe:value not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component time swe:value start (', $timeRangeStart, ') is not a valid ISO 8601 date for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component time swe:value end (', $timeRangeEnd, ') is not a valid ISO 8601 date for component ', @name)

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.10
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a network of stations provides definition of the observed properties for each network member station in sml:output [@name#"observed_Property"]/swe:Quantity [@definition="anyURI" elements, where anyURI is a reference to the IOOS vocabulary record.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: component sml:outputs not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component sml:OutputList not found for component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: component sml:OutputList has no sml:outputs component ', @name)
concat('FAIL: swe:Quantity has no name component ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: swe:Quantity not found for sml:output ', @name, ' in component ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: swe:Quantity definition not found for sml:output ', @name, ' in component ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: swe:Quantity definition (', swe:Quantity/@definition, ') is not a valid parameter for sml:output ', @name, ' in component ', $componentName)

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.11
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a single station provides valid value of the sml:classifier [@name="platformType" element with the reference definition and IOOS codeSpace.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: platformType sml:value (', $platformTypeValue/text(), ') is not a valid IOOS platform type')

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.12
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a single station provides valid value of the sml:classifier [@name="operatorSector" element with the reference definition and IOOS codeSpace.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: operatorSector sml:value (', $operatorSectorValue/text(), ') is not a valid IOOS sector')

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.13
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a single station provides valid value of the sml:classifier [@name="publisher" element with the reference definition and IOOS codeSpace.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: publisher sml:value (', $publisherValue/text(), ') is not a valid IOOS organization')

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.14
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a single station provides valid value of the sml:classifier [@name="sponsor" element with the reference definition and IOOS codeSpace.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: sponsor sml:value (', $sponsorValue/text(), ') is not a valid IOOS organization')

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.15
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a single station provides a time range of observations for the station in sml:capabilities [@name="observationTimeRange"] element with a valid time value pair specifying a time range in ISO 8601 format.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: time swe:value start (', $timeRangeStart, ') is not a valid ISO 8601 date')
concat('FAIL: time swe:value end (', $timeRangeEnd, ') is not a valid ISO 8601 date')

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.16
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a single station provides a location of the station in sml:location/gml:Point [@srsName="http://www.opengis.net/def/crs/EPSG/0/4326" element with the valid latitude and longitude value pair.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAIL: gml:pos latitude coordinate not found
FAIL: gml:pos longitude coordinate not found

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: gml:pos latitude (', $gmlPosLat, ') is invalid')
concat('FAIL: gml:pos longitude (', $gmlPosLng, ') is invalid')

ctl:test.name: describeSensor:IOOS-SOS.DescribeSensor-ResponseContainsValidOperationsMetadataProperty.17
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: SensorML document for a single station provides a description of at least one sensor that is located at the station (platform), and for each sensor a "sensorID" and a list of the properties observed by this sensor are provided.

ctl:message.select: concat('FAIL: component sml:System not found for ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: component sml:System/sml:identification not found for ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: component sml:System/sml:identification/@xlink:href not found for ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: component sml:System/sml:identification/@xlink:href (', $componentSmlIdentificationHref, ') is not a valid IOOS sensor URN for ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: component sml:System/sml:outputs not found for ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: component sml:System/sml:outputs/sml:OutputList not found for ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: component sml:System/sml:outputs/sml:OutputList/sml:output not found for ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: output @name not found in ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: output swe:Quantity not found for output ', $outputName, ' in component ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: output swe:Quantity/@definition not found for output ', $outputName, ' in component ', $componentName)
concat('FAIL: swe:Quantity definition (', $outputSweQuantityDefinition, ') is not a valid parameter for sml:output ', $outputName, ' in component ', $componentName)
